alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 2:44PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Holmes and northeastern Washington Counties through 230 PM CDT... At 143 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Vernon, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Chipley, Bonifay, Bradford, Caryville, Wausau, Brock Crossroad, Chipley Municipal Airport, Orange Hill, Holmes County Airport, Whitehead Crossroads, Gilberts Mill, Five Points, Hulaw, Sunny Hills, Poplar Head and Johnson Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
